nodes.bodyText: Are you sure that we should get rid of this? Even though this isn't used at the moment, this will be necessary for subscribing to hub events by operation (which is currently broken, but that needs to be fixed right?)
I think the operation-integration hub events might be cool, but we're not very close to having them, I don't think. We should come back and look at this integration after GA.

Ah I see you are removing this also. Nevermind about my comment about operation ID then.
Would it be a non-trivial task to fix this before GA?

I haven't thought much about what we would need to do here. I think it will take a bit of study to see what iOS is doing, and rebuild from that. We should talk to Tim, and revisit this Hub integration, probably after GA.
